text: @piersmorgan @benshapiro You’re not just “reporting the Govt coronavirus testing numbers”, you’re screaming like some deranged lunatic on a daily basis. You’re negative, criticise everything and haven’t got behind the country or government at all. People are fed up of your hysterics.
